CustomField.description: What supports or strategies might you like to try this semester? (Check all that apply.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What supports or strategies might you like to try this semester? (Check all that apply.)
CustomField.label: Support strategies you may try

value.fullName: Time tracking/time boxing (using a calendar, timer or app to monitor focus/time spent on a task)
value.label: Time tracking/time boxing (using a calendar, timer or app to monitor focus/time spent on a task)

value.fullName: Using task lists and calendars to organize and schedule specific tasks
value.label: Using task lists and calendars to organize and schedule specific tasks

value.fullName: Using a reward system or goal-setting journal
value.label: Using a reward system or goal-setting journal

value.fullName: Tracking distractions and creating plan to limit them
value.label: Tracking distractions and creating plan to limit them

value.fullName: Creating a social calendar to connect regularly with friends and family
value.label: Creating a social calendar to connect regularly with friends and family

value.fullName: Meeting with staff (e.g. Academic Provider faculty at the Verto locations, ASC, SLC, or College Counselor) to discuss experience
value.label: Meeting with staff (e.g. Academic Provider faculty at the Verto locations, ASC, SLC, or College Counselor) to discuss experience

value.fullName: Regular meeting(s) with staff (e.g. Academic Provider faculty at the Verto locations, ASC, SLC) to practice skills, discuss work and/or goals
value.label: Regular meeting(s) with staff (e.g. Academic Provider faculty at the Verto locations, ASC, SLC) to practice skills, discuss work and/or goals

value.fullName: Regular meeting(s) with peers, study group and/or attend study hall with ASC
value.label: Regular meeting(s) with peers, study group and/or attend study hall with ASC

value.fullName: Creating a self-care/mental health routine and/or practice (a) new habit(s)
value.label: Creating a self-care/mental health routine and/or practice (a) new habit(s)

value.fullName: Meeting with staff (e.g. faculty, ASC, SLC, or College Counselor) to discuss experience
value.label: Meeting with staff (e.g. faculty, ASC, SLC, or College Counselor) to discuss experience

value.fullName: Regular meeting(s) with staff (e.g. faculty, ASC, SLC) to practice skills, discuss work and/or goals
value.label: Regular meeting(s) with staff (e.g. faculty, ASC, SLC) to practice skills, discuss work and/or goals
